devdoc.details: This contract should be the emission admin of the reward tokens to be notifiedThe aTokens need to give approval to this contract to claim the rewards

emergencyWithdrawal(address,address,uint.details: Perform an emergency token withdrawal only callable by the Rewards admin

params.to: Address of the recipient of the withdrawal
params.token: Address of the token to withdraw funds from this contract

getAToken(address).details: Helper function to get the aToken address for a reserve

returns._0: Returns the address of the Incentives Controller
Returns the address of the Rewards admin

notifyEmissionManager(address,address,ad.details: can only be called by a whitelisted address

params._oracle: The oracle that will be used to calculate the USD value of the rewards
params._reserve: The reserve for which the rewards are being notified
params._token: The reward token that is being notified

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

performTransfer(address,address,uint256).details: Perform custom transfer logic via delegate call from source contract to a TransferStrategy implementation

params.amount: Amount to transfer to the "to" address parameter

returns._0: Returns true bool if transfer logic succeeds

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

whitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelists an address to be used by the EmissionManager

__gap.details: storage gap to avoid future storage layout conflicts

emissionManager.details: The emission manager contract used to allocate emissions

emissionsReceived.details: Mapping to keep track of the rewards that have been received

incentiveController.details: The incentive controller contract used to transfer the rewards

lastNotified.details: Mapping to keep track of the last time the EmissionManager was notified

whitelisted.details: Mapping to keep track of the whitelisted addresses

notifyEmissionManager(address,address,ad.notice: Notifies the EmissionManager of the rewards that are available for a specific reserve

userdoc.notice: TokenEmissionsStrategy is a contract that allows the emission of rewards to be notified to the EmissionManager
